original_text: And they defeated the remnant of the Amalekites who had escaped, and they have lived there to this day.
korean_text: 피신하여 살아남은 아말렉 사람을 치고 오늘까지 거기에 거주하고 있더라

sentences.original_text: And they defeated the remnant of the Amalekites
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 아말렉 사람들의 남은 자들을 격파했다

sentences.original_text: and they have lived there to this day
